subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova recovered from a shaky start and outlasted Marion Bartoli, 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, while Sara Errani beat her doubles partner, Roberta Vinci, 6-2, 6-4.
snippet: Maria Sharapova recovered from a shaky start and outlasted Marion Bartoli, 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, while Sara Errani beat her doubles partner, Roberta Vinci, 6-2, 6-4.
